meanings.definition: A person who specializes in cybernetics.
meanings.sent1: The cyberneticists at the conference shared their latest research findings.
meanings.sent2: Many cyberneticists work in the field of artificial intelligence.
meanings.sent3: The cyberneticists had a robot dance-off to test their creations.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, cyberneticists are the wizards of innovation.
meanings.sent5: The cyberneticists' lab was filled with whirring machines and glowing screens.

meanings.definition: Those who study or practice cybernetics.
meanings.sent1: The group of cyberneticists collaborated on a project to improve communication systems.
meanings.sent2: Cyberneticists analyze feedback loops to enhance system performance.
meanings.sent3: The cyberneticists' meeting turned into a lively debate on robot ethics.
meanings.sent4: Like conductors of a grand orchestra, cyberneticists orchestrate the harmony of technology.
meanings.sent5: The cyberneticists' research led to groundbreaking advancements in robotics.
